channel.title: My own, custom shops?
channel.description: Alright, now I haven't made my own shop in about a year. Can someone give me an example of a shop code, and how to make the shop tradable?

item.title: My own, custom shops?
item.dc:creator: @Maxammus Maxammus
item.description:
@Maxammus wrote:

//-ShopID-------ShopName-------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount shop = 1 Shop Name 2 2 7158 100 3105 100 [ENDOFSHOPLIST]

Then look around in your client.java for other shops, case 155 for first click npc (Talk to), 17 for second click (trade) and add your shop and npc you want to be the shop keeper.

Read full topic
